entity.name: Abhishek Ravikant Yadav
entity.description: Abhishek Ravikant Yadav is an AI developer who created FundGenius AI to help Indian investors make smarter mutual fund decisions using machine learning and sentiment analysis.

projects.name: FundGenius AI
projects.description: FundGenius AI is an intelligent mutual fund advisory tool powered by machine learning and real-time news sentiment analysis. It provides accurate BUY / HOLD / SELL recommendations based on future NAV predictions and current market sentiment.
